node_editor.node_node module¶

class node_editor.node_node.Node(scene: Scene, title='Undefined Node', inputs=[], outputs=[])¶

Bases: node_editor.node_serializable.Serializable

Instantiate a new Node and add it to the Graphical Scene

Instance Attributes:

scene - reference to the Scene grNode - reference to the GraphicsNode

Parameters

  • scene (Scene) – Reference to the Scene

  • title (str) – Name of the node displayed on the upper side of the Node

  • inputs (list of Socket) –

  • outputs (list of Socket) –

initInnerClasses()¶

Instantiate innerclasses : - node_content_class : by default NodeContentWidget - graphics_node_class : by default GraphicsNode

Uses internal methodes getNodeContentClass and getGraphicsNodeClass to obtain the definition

of the above two classes

getSocketPosition(index: int, position: node_editor.node_socket.SocketPosition, num_out_of: int = 1)¶

Helper function - returns the position of a socket in pixels relative to the node

Parameters

  • index (`int`) – Index of the socket in the list

  • position (SocketPosition) – One of enumeration

  • num_out_of (`int`) – total number of Socket on this position

Returns

x, y position relative to the node

Return type

`list`
